law.catch_line: Duties of Office for Education and Workforce Statistics.
law.history: Amended 2014 Ky. Acts ch. 26, sec. 1, effective July 15, 2014. -- Created 2013 Ky. Acts ch. 18, sec. 3, effective June 25, 2013; and ch. 90, sec. 3, effective June 25, 2013.

metadata.lrc-note: (6/25/2013). This statute was created with identical text in 2013 Ky. Acts chs. 18 and 90, which were companion bills. These Acts have been codified together.
